entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
